Variable definition: incrementing number preserving the order of the dataframe

Units: Part of shrub sampled: LS - largest stem; RC - root collar; SI - stem increment; WMS - wintermarksepta

Variable definition: other relevant information for each site's data

Units: TC - if data have been cross-referenced to a tree chronology; SC - if data have been cross-referenced to an existing shrub chronology; SI - if data have been cross-referenced to other shrub individuals at the same site; RA - if data have not been cross-referenced; NA - if not applicable to data
